name: Tiny Frontier Saga
description:
A short roguelike set in the Wild West, written in 48 hours for CGA Jam.

Play as the righteous Sheriff Boone called to the aid of his sweetheart Amanda, captured by road agents led by the vicious Al Swearengen. Fight off his henchmen with rifles, shotguns, dynamite and molotovs - and if all else fails, you've always got your right hook! Survive the mean streets of the town, face Al at the Gem, and win back your girl!

Controls Touch / Mouse / Trackpad:
Move: Tap/click in a direction to move
Interact: Tap/click on the player to interact
Attack: Tap/click on an enemy
Keyboard & Mouse:
Move: Arrow keys
Interact: Enter
Attack / Inventory: Left-click Development

You can read more about the development of Tiny Frontier Saga here - but it's still in active development! If you have any suggestions, comments or criticisms you'd like to share with me, please leave a comment below, or get in touch on Twitter @chilly_durango. I'm considering a mobile app release too, and would especially like to hear from mobile users!
